form.official-title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to expedite geothermal exploration and development in previously studied or developed areas.

section.text: Section 390 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 15942) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by inserting , or the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970 (30 U.S.C. 1001 et seq.) for the purpose of exploration or development of geothermal resources after or gas; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking or gas and inserting , gas, or geothermal; and
